content: ** now free if you ve purchased this pattern please send me a message i ll give you a 50% discount for any of my other patterns ** amigurumi pattern for one of the cutest pokémon ampharos this pattern is not a tutorial so you ll have to know at least the basic amigurumi skills such as -magic_ring -single_crochet half-double_crochet -increase and decrease you will need -yarn and hook -safety eyes 8mm pictured -stuffing -scissors and knitting needle if you have any questions you can always contact me through my shop this is a pdf file that you will be able to download as soon as you complete the purchase ampharos belongs to nintendo enjoy
